text: I am Legend (2007)
I don't need to be reminded I am lonely.
The Mask (1994)
One of the good Jim Carrey movies!

hint.name: Patrick
text: No more work, no more going out, and nothing special on TV...
I'm bored... It would be nice to call Nathan.

telephone.name: Patrick
text: Who should I call?
Nathan (friend)
Sandrine (friend)
Paul (cousin)

nathan.name: Nathan
text: Hello! How are you?
I'm fine! I'm on forced holidays.
Well, I'm feeling lonely.

bien.name: Nathan
text: Nice, you're the lucky one!
Hmmmm OK, but... these holidays at home.
Hmmmm OK, but... these are unpaid holidays.

seul.name: Nathan
text: Don't say that... You cannot guess how much I want to be in your shoes!
How come? I don't meet anybody!
What? Things ain't well with Élise?

personne.name: Nathan
text: I'm just saying that you're lucky not to be stuck
with the same person everyday.
This it the worst time to be a bachelor! I'd prefer being with someone during the lockdown.
We always want what we don't have, do we?
choices.preview: We always want what we don't have?

couple.name: Nathan
text: I keep working. From Home. And Élise too...
So... let's face it, it's far from being holidays.
Sometimes, there is a tense atmosphere between us.
Huh? Things are not going well with Élise?

elise.name: Nathan
text: Listen. It's not easy.
We are more or less 24 hours a day stuck together in this tiny flat.
After a while, After a while, we argue over nothing.
Oh no!
It could be worse. We can switch if you want.

conseil.name: Nathan
text: I really don't know what to do.
If we don't find a solution, I'll be single vefore the end of the lockdown..
I think you need to care more about her. You should think about it.
Wait and it'll pass. Everybody's a bit tense nowadays.

finMauvais.name: Nathan
text: Ok fine! I'll follow your advice then. I need to go, bye!
Ok, just keep me informed. Talk to you soon!

finBon.name: Nathan
text: Oh thank you! I'll follow your advice then. I need to go, bye!
Ok, just keep me informer. Talk to you soon!

sandrine.name: Sandrine
text: Hi, how are you? It's been a long time!
Hi! You're right, it's been so long. What are you up to nowadays?

hello.name: Sandrine
text: What can I say… not much.
This is not the right time to be unemployed.
I understand. This is not the right time to be independant either...

independant.name: Sandrine
text: Yes, that's right. You don't have work anymore?
No, and I cannot claim unemployment benefit...
No. Forced unpaid holidays...

aide.name: Sandrine
text: Oh no! I am so sorry.
Let me know if you need help for anything!
Thank you, this is very nice of you!
Thank you, I'll let you know then!

apero.name: Sandrine
text: Ok! Otherwise, I'll organise a Skype reunion with the others? You're available, I guess?
Yes, you can count on me!
No, sorry. I am not fond of these online gatherings.

oui.name: Sandrine
text: Rad! See you on Saturday!

non.name: Sandrine
text: No worries! Let's talk another time. Bye!

paul.name: Paul
text: Hello!
Hello Paul! How do you do?
choices.preview: Hello Paul! How do you do?

desole.name: Paul
text: Hello Patrick. I am sorry but I don't have much time right now.
I am working on a new project. It's about the covid.
I'll tell you more about it another time! Ciao.
